title: Capture a Base
description: Successfully capture any facility or outpost.

title: Defend a Base
description: Prevent the enemy from capturing a facility you own.

title: Spawn Beacon Deployed
description: Deploy a spawn beacon for your squad.

title: Destroy a Vehicle
description: Eliminate any enemy vehicle using C4, rockets, or weapon fire.

title: Repair a Vehicle
description: Use your repair tool to repair an allied vehicle. (At least 50%)

title: Revive a Teammate
description: Bring a fallen ally back into battle with your medical applicator.

title: Necromancer
description: Revive 5 teammates using a single Revive Grenade.

title: Kill Streak
description: Achieve 5 kills without dying.

title: Vehicle Kill Streak
description: Destroy 3 enemy vehicles without dying.

title: Headshot Kill
description: Score a headshot kill with any weapon.

title: Kill a Max
description: Destroy an enemy MAX unit.

title: Kill MAX as MAX
description: Defeat another MAX while playing as a MAX.

title: RPG Kill
description: Eliminate an enemy with a rocket launcher.

title: C4 Kill
description: Eliminate an enemy with a C4 detonation.

title: Kill a Cloaker
description: Eliminate a cloaked enemy infiltrator.

title: Kill Through Smoke
description: Eliminate a kill while visibility is obscured by smoke.

title: Kill a Bounty
description: Eliminate a player marked with a bounty.

title: Kill a Light Assault
description: Eliminate a Light Assault enemy.

title: Kill a Heavy
description: Eliminate a Heavy Assault enemy.

title: Kill a Medic
description: Eliminate a Combat Medic enemy.

title: Kill an Engineer
description: Eliminate a Engineer enemy.

title: Kill an Infiltrator
description: Eliminate an Infiltrator enemy.

title: Become a Bounty
description: Earn a bounty on yourself.

title: One Life
description: Win a fight with 1 hp remaining.

title: Destroy a Generator
description: Overload and destroy a base generator.

title: Hack a Terminal
description: Use the Infiltrator class to hack a terminal.

title: Destroy a Spawn Beacon
description: Destroy an enemy spawn beacon.

title: Roadkill
description: Run over an enemy with a ground vehicle.

title: Sunderer Deployed
description: Deploy a Sunderer that allies use as a spawn point. (Players must spawn on it)

title: Anti-Air
description: Destroy any Air Vehicle.
